title: Good Accounting Obligation in Government Act
content: Good Accounting Obligation in Government Act or the GAO-IG Act This bill requires each federal agency, in its annual budget justification, to include a report on: (1) each public recommendation of the Government Accountability Office (GAO) that is classified as quot, openquot, or quot, closed, unimplementedquot, . (2) each public recommendation for corrective action from the agency's office of the inspector general (OIG) for which no final action has been taken. And (3) the implementation status of each such recommendation. Each agency shall also provide a copy of this information to its OIG and to the GAO.
